name: Something's Missing
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #31

!Currently the web version is not working! The Windows version did work when I downloaded it.

Controls:

Keyboard:  WASD or Arrow Keys to Move,  Spacebar is Action,  R is Respawn,  Esc is Back.

Controller:  Left Stick to Move,  Cross/A is Action,  Square/X is Respawn,  Circle/B is Back.

The original idea was going to be a puzzle game, but I couldn't make that work. Maybe you'll still enjoy this even though it was a bit rushed.

Sources:

Music: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Kevin_MacLeod/Calming/Dream_Culture

Background: https://dinvstudio.itch.io/dynamic-space-background-lite-free

Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Noto+Sans
